function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presumed linearity in relationships between IEQ factors","Impact":"Misleading assessment of IEQ performance and ineffective mitigation of issues","Mitigation":"Conduct in-depth analysis to understand the complex interactions between IEQ factors and avoid oversimplification","Technologies":"Advanced modeling and simulation tools for comprehensive IEQ analysis","People":"Occupants, building managers, and researchers","Owner":"Building managers, IEQ researchers, and industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Completely ignoring interaction effects in IEQ models","Impact":"Failure to accurately capture the impact of environmental factors on occupant satisfaction","Mitigation":"Incorporate advanced techniques such as machine learning and data analytics to identify and account for interaction effects","Technologies":"Machine learning algorithms, advanced data analytics tools","People":"Building designers, researchers, and data analysts","Owner":"Building designers and researchers"},{"Description":"Lack of standardised measurement protocols for IEQ","Impact":"Inconsistent and unreliable assessment of IEQ performance across different buildings","Mitigation":"Develop and implement standardized measurement protocols for consistent and accurate IEQ assessments","Technologies":"Sensor technologies, data recording systems, and data analysis software","People":"Building managers, IEQ researchers, and standardization organizations","Owner":"Standardization organizations and industry stakeholders"}]}
